Name: rowDragColor
Description: Color of line indicating row drop location

Name: dragDropColor
Description: Color of line indicating drag/drop location

Name: dividingLineColor
Description: Dividing line for parameter: Row Striping

Name: dragDropOverlayColor
Description: Color of highlight indicating drag/drop location in row mode

Name: rowStripeOverlayColor
Description: Used when Row Striping is set to "Striping"

Name: indentWidth
Description: Width for one level of indent

Name: wiredOverlayCols
Description: Space separated list of cols to use wiredOverlayColor on
